About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello, my name is Manuel. I'm a web developer with a background in Graphic Design and life-long dedication to learning. I have a strong attention to detail and adept at working with diverse teams to implement projects. I'm experienced in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign. I have also worked with Sass, Materialize, Bootstrap, Node Js, Express, MongoDB and React.

Director of Retail Information

Transwestern Commercial Services

Managed the Houston retail web page by updating new listings and announcements of new clients. Developed e-blast and announcement with links to project listings flyers or retail, restaurant websites.

Graphic Design Specialist

International Center of Entrepreneurial Development

Generated marketing materials for multi-million dollar franchise holding company including franchises such as Northwest Forest Conference Center, Kwik Kopy Printing, AWT, Parcel Plus and Computer Explorers.
